name: Dungeons and Drinks
description:
The goal of this game is to survive as long as you can as a painfully human bartender in hell. Use shift to toggle between facing your ferocious patrons and mixing... drinks... underneath the bar. Be careful what you mix- you may find that the ingredients tend not to agree with each other. 

Controls:

* Shift toggles between the patrons and making drinks

* Grab and drop items into the glass using your mouse.

* Click on the tools to launch mini games that allow you to use them.

* Watch the flag to keep track of how suspicious the monsters are of you.

Joey Bush, Sam Hallam, Jocylin Lopez, Timothy Pham
